description: Build a code-puppy plugin that captures telemetry events via callback hooks and writes them to elcs/telemetry/ as JSONL. This enables observational telemetry without requiring agent compliance.
resolution: Successfully built telemetry plugin capturing all key events via infrastructure hooks. Validated with live testing.
acceptance_criteria: Plugin loads successfully with uvx code-puppy
Redacts sensitive data (no secrets, credentials, full file contents)
Includes confusion signal detection from response text
notes: This is infrastructure for validating H6 (distance vectors) and H8 (infrastructure telemetry). Will be tested with complex organic prompt (H9).
